title: Our Journey Begins, My Love
note: Hey Akanksha, my dearest star. I've built this little universe just for you, a map of all the incredible moments that make up your story, and ours. See that age in the top-left? That'll change as we travel together. And when you see a star with lots of memories, just use the arrows or your keyboard – left and right – to see them all. This first star? It's just a little glimpse of the amazing you, right now, before we rewind and see how it all began. So, are you ready to recall our beautiful story, woven in the stars?
displayDateInfo: Some of my favorite recent pictures of you (around 2023-2024)

title: A Whisper of Magic
note: And so, with that first spark, something truly special was about to happen, a whisper of magic that would soon fill your family with so much happiness. The universe itself seemed to hold its breath, because a true miracle, a beautiful soul, was preparing to make her grand entrance...

title: You Arrived: Our World Aligned
note: Then, you arrived! You came into this beautiful, small world, and just like that, that day became the most wonderful day for your family, for everyone who was waiting, and especially, my love, for the future me who didn't even know yet how much you'd mean. You were the missing piece, the light we didn't realize we were waiting for.

title: Wrapped in Warmth: Our Little Star
note: Look at you, so tiny, already the brightest star in their sky, cradled in so much love and warmth. These first family moments were like a soft, comforting blanket woven with gentle cuddles, happy coos, and the pure, unconditional love that only family can give. Every little thing you did was a treasure.

title: A World to Discover
note: And from that cocoon of love, the great big world started to unfold before your very eyes. Every day was a brand new adventure, wasn't it? A playground of exciting new things to see, to touch, to understand. Your laughter, so pure and bright, became the soundtrack to those years of wonderful discovery.

title: Childhood's Golden Haze: Family Adventures
note: Fast forward a little, and here you are, right in the middle of those golden childhood years, surrounded by your amazing family. Remember all the fun? The games, the stories, maybe a few scraped knees that were quickly kissed better? These are the times, filled with so much laughter and shared experiences, that built the incredible, strong, and kind person you were already becoming.

title: Remember 2018? Our Little Shararti Girl!
note: And just like that, time flew, didn't it? Suddenly you were this bundle of energy in 2018! Look at these pictures, Akanksha… so full of mischief and those endless giggles. Honestly, your happy, slightly naughty spirit in these just makes my heart melt. You were already such a character!

title: 2019: Your Smile, My Sunshine!
note: And here we are in 2019, and look at you – just blossoming, my dear! That incredible smile of yours could always light up the whole world, I swear. More adventures, more laughter, and that same wonderfully cheeky charm that I (and everyone!) absolutely adore.

title: Someone Special Comes Along
note: You know, as we grow, life has this funny way of bringing very special people into our orbit. Friends who just *get* you, who feel more like family, who you can laugh with until your stomach hurts and cry with when things get tough. And I know there’s someone just like that for you…

title: Ananya: Your Soul Sister!
note: Ananya! Yes, your amazing, wonderful Ananya. More than just a school friend, right? She's truly like a sister from another mother. That bond you two share is so, so precious. And you, Janu, always there for her, her rock, especially when our little cry-baby Ananya needs a shoulder. That kind of dosti is pure gold, meri jaan.

title: The Heart's True Home
note: And speaking of bonds that run deep... family, hai na? I know it's the most important star in everyone's life. They care for us, they make us feel happy, and seeing them happy? That makes us even happier. They're our foundation, our always-place.

title: The Family We Hold So Dear
note: Here are some precious moments with your family, Janu. Every picture just brims with so much love, countless shared stories, and those deep connections that don't even need words. And even when a guiding star, someone incredibly special like your mom, isn't visible in every frame, her love, her presence, it's always, always there with you, isn't it? A part of your heart, a warmth you carry, forever cherished.

title: A Mother's Embrace
note: You know, Janu, a mother's love is truly a universe in itself – so vast, so unconditional. It's a warmth that stays with us, a guiding light that never really fades, even when we can't see her star shining right next to us. Her essence, her blessings, they are woven into the very fabric of who you are...

title: Together: A Perfect Moment in Time
note: And here... here is such a beautiful, complete moment. Look, your wonderful family, all together, with your precious Mom right there. Can you feel the love in this picture? The happiness? It's like holding a perfect, timeless memory in your hands. These are the moments that are everything, truly everything.
images: random family pic/Complete family pic with mother/P_20180822_180740.jpg

title: Her Beautiful Legacy
note: She gave you so much, didn't she? Not just life, but her strength, her kindness, her smile... little pieces of her wonderful spirit that live on so brightly in you. Every time you show that courage, or that gentle heart, it's like we get to see her beautiful legacy shining through...

title: Like Mother, Like Daughter: Her Reflection in You
note: And speaking of her legacy, just look at you, my dear. There are these moments, these expressions, this certain light in your eyes... when I see you, I see so much of her beautiful spirit reflected back. It's in your grace, your warmth, that incredible strength you have. It's a connection that's truly timeless, a beautiful echo of her love living on in you.
displayDateInfo: Moments that remind us (Photos around May 25, 2022)

title: A Heart Full of Love
note: Your heart has always been so big, Janu, full of love for everyone, especially the little ones. They just flock to you, don't they? And you have this special way with them...

title: Our Adorable Little Addu Adventure!
note: And speaking of little ones, remember this day with tiny Addu? Oh my goodness, he's just the cutest, and I know how much you adore that little munchkin! Putting him in that bag... or was it a basket? Classic Akanksha! So playful, so loving. What a hilarious and sweet memory this is!
images: Akanksha photos grouped/little addu in basket funny/IMG20230529113928.jpg

title: School Day Squad: Friends for Life!
note: Throwback to school days! Look at this gang. So many memories made, so much laughter shared. These are the friendships that shape our early years, the friends we shared our tiffins and secrets with. What a great bunch!

title: Destiny's Crossroads
note: And then, Janu, came a place that was more than just a college... it was a turning point, a crossroads where so many paths were about to merge, including ours, in the most unexpected way. Remember Anjuman? That place holds so many stories for you... your big group of friends, maybe even an 'enemy' or two still lurking in the memories, haha! And yes, it's where you found your first love... and then, well, then there was me, Nikhil, about to make a rather clumsy entrance into your life...

title: Anjuman College: Where Our Story Began
note: Anjuman! So many chapters started here. Your college life, full of friends, studies, and so much happening. And yes, this is where destiny played its hand for us. Remember that day? Me on my motorcycle... I *almost* crashed right into you! Who knew that chaotic moment would lead to... well, to everything. This place, these memories, they are the foundation of 'us'.

title: The Anjuman Squad: First Benchers & Fun
note: And in Anjuman, of course, there was your amazing squad! Anushka, Daraksha, Alefiya, and you – the unstoppable first-benchers, teachers' favorites, right? Sharing notes, probably a bit of scolding each other too, but always together. Those college friendships, they're a special kind of magic, building memories that last a lifetime.

title: A Bond Deeper Than Most
note: College life brings all sorts of connections, but some friendships just click on a different level. You find that one person who becomes your confidante, your rock, someone who understands you without you even having to say much. For you, in Anjuman, there was such a friend, wasn't there? Someone truly special...

title: Rabiya: Your College Bestie & Confidante
note: Rabiya! Yes, her. Such a mature, calm, and caring soul. She was more than just a friend; she was the one who truly *got* you, the one who knew about us, about you and me, Nikhil, right from the early days. That kind of understanding and support is priceless. And perhaps, in her own quiet way, she sensed there was someone else who was becoming even more important in your life, someone who'd soon make your heart flutter a little differently...

title: That Special Someone: Me, Nikhil!
note: And that 'someone else'... well, that was me, wasn't it, my love? Slowly, surely, our paths intertwined more and more. From that almost-crash to stolen glances, shy smiles, and then... then 'us'. These pictures, they remind me of those early days, the butterflies, the excitement of getting to know the incredible person you are. This star, Janu, this is for us, for our beginning.

title: The World Changed: Lockdown Days
note: Then, the world took a strange turn. Lockdown. We were separated, couldn't meet like we used to. It was a tough time for everyone, and I know you had your own worries at home, with Dadi and Papa not being well. But even though we were physically apart, we found our ways, didn't we? Those Telegram video calls, the endless chats, the virtual romance... they became our lifeline.

title: Lockdown Naughtiness & Cute Faces
note: And oh, those video calls! Remember the silly faces, the two ponytails you'd sometimes make just to be cute and a little bit naughty? Those close-up smiles, the sleepy eyes after a long chat... those moments, those expressions, they were our little pockets of sunshine during a really difficult period. Even in lockdown, your spirit, your ability to find joy and make me smile, it just shone through, meri jaan.
images: Akanksha photos grouped/Cute faces/lockdown naughty girl/IMG20221204015049.jpg
Akanksha photos grouped/Cute faces/lockdown naughty girl/Snapchat-1392412232.jpg
Akanksha photos grouped/Cute faces/lockdown naughty girl/Snapchat-1410491256.jpg

Akanksha photos grouped/Cute faces/lockdown naughty girl/Snapchat-930619688.jpg

title: A New Chapter Unfolds
note: And just like that, after what felt like ages, the world started to breathe again. Lockdown couldn't hold back life forever, and a brand new adventure was waiting just around the corner. Remember that feeling, my love? That mix of anticipation and maybe a few butterflies as the gates to a new phase of college life were about to open. A whole new world was calling out to you.

title: Stepping into YCCE: A New World
note: And then came YCCE! What a huge campus, a whole new world unfolding before you. I remember you telling me how grand it all felt. You know, whenever you've faced any challenge, I've always tried to be there for you, and YCCE was no different. There was that one tricky situation you got into, and remember? I stepped onto your campus, and just like that, the problem vanished. Always got your back, my love. More than just classrooms, YCCE was where you started forging a new kind of strength, getting ready to take on whatever came next.

title: The YCCE Crew: Laughter & Lessons
note: And of course, college means a new crew! Your YCCE friends... what a lively bunch – happy, funny, and definitely a bit naughty. I can only imagine the kind of conversations you all had, the shared laughter, the secrets whispered. These are the friends who paint our college memories with the brightest colors, making every day an adventure.

title: That One Special Connection
note: In the midst of all the new faces and friendships, sometimes you find that one person who just... clicks. Someone who becomes more than a friend, a true soulmate, your confidante. And I know, in the lively halls of YCCE, you found someone like that, a gem who understood you deeply.

title: Harshada: A Friend Like No Other
note: Harshada! Your YCCE soul sister. So beautiful, a little shy, but with such a warm heart and a depth of understanding that's rare. She knew about us, about our story, and that meant the world. It's a true regret that you couldn't be at her wedding, I know how much that hurt, but your love and wishes surely reached her. A friend like Harshada is a gift.

title: YCCE Annual Function: My Dazzling Diva!
note: Oh, and the YCCE annual function! You looked absolutely breathtaking. That night out at Vidhi's, getting ready in that traditional saree... you were a vision, my love. It’s one of my biggest regrets that I couldn’t see you in person that night; if you looked that stunning in photos, seeing you face-to-face would have made me fall in love all over again. You truly outshone everyone there, even without being on stage!

title: The Fury Brewing
note: Thinking back, there are moments that still make my chest tighten with anger. There was an incident, something involving those guys, your so-called 'friends' from YCCE, that I just can't forget. The sheer disrespect, the thoughtlessness... it infuriated me. I held back for your sake, Janu, but the storm inside me was raging. Let the next memory show you a glimpse of why.
displayDateInfo: An anger I couldn't show then...

title: That Birthday... & The Silver Lining
note: Yes, *that* 2022 birthday. Cake in your hair, eggs, that sticky orange drink, even flour! It was a complete, disgusting mess, and frankly, a rotten way for anyone to be treated, especially on their birthday. My anger at those guys from YCCE still flares up when I see these pictures of what they did. But, we salvaged it, didn't we? Despite that awful start, I hope my surprise gifts and our evening, especially that beautiful picture with Ananya, brought some real celebration to your day. You deserved a kingdom, my love, not that chaos, but we found our sunshine.

title: Our Sanctuary: Little Wood Park & Phutala
note: Remember our special place, my love? Little Wood Park and the Phutala Lake. That was our sanctuary, wasn't it? We'd walk hand-in-hand, play around like kids, and just talk for hours, sharing everything – our dreams, our worries, all the little tensions of life. It was there, amidst the calm of the woods and the gentle lapping of the lake, that we built so many precious memories, just us, relaxing and connecting.

title: Fuel Station: Our Nagpur Oasis
note: And how can we forget Fuel Station, our absolute favorite cafe in Nagpur! Oh, the taste of everything there was just divine. Your KitKat shake and my cold coffee – perfect combo! We must have been there like 25-30 times, yaar. Now that we're in Pune, I know we both miss that place like crazy. So many dates, so many conversations, so much yumminess. Fuel Station will always be special.
images: Akanksha photos grouped/our fav cafe Fuel station/Snapchat-638914284.jpg

title: The New Haircut: My Stunning Girl!
note: You know I've always loved your long hair, my dear. But you kept insisting, and after months of your sweet requests, I finally gave in – 'Okay, go for it!' And wow, when you got that haircut, you looked absolutely stunning! I loved it instantly. So, here's my official declaration: you can cut your hair whenever you like, meri jaan, no restrictions from my side ever again. You always look beautiful.
images: Akanksha photos grouped/your New Hair Cut/IMG20211205222315.jpg
Akanksha photos grouped/your New Hair Cut/IMG20211210224310.jpg

title: First Kurti & That Adorable Teased Face!
note: I've always adored you in kurtis, Janu; you look absolutely breathtaking in them. So when your father bought you this one, and you surprised me, I was just floored! And then, that day we went for momos, and I teased you a little about how gorgeous you looked... that cute, slightly pouting face you made? Absolutely adorable! This picture captures that perfect mix of stunning and sweet.
images: Akanksha photos grouped/First kurti and cute masti/IMG20221024203533.jpg
Akanksha photos grouped/First kurti and cute masti/IMG20230226212426.jpg
Akanksha photos grouped/First kurti and cute masti/IMG20230226212623.jpg

title: Your Favorite Dress: Pure Joy!
note: And then there are these moments, in one of your favorite dresses, where you just radiate pure joy! Look at that smile, that happiness, that cute innocent face like a little baby – it makes my heart race every single time. You look so incredibly happy and stunning here, my love. It's this carefree spirit that I absolutely adore.
displayDateInfo: Radiant in your favorite dress (around May 7, 2023)

title: My Favorite Look: Bollywood Heroine!
note: But if I had to pick *my* absolute favorite... it would be this. You, in this lehenga-style traditional dress for that wedding occasion. Oh my god, Janu! You looked like a heroine straight out of a Bollywood movie. The cuteness was just overloaded! Wow... I was, and still am, completely mesmerized. Truly, my beautiful star.
displayDateInfo: My absolute favorite look of yours (around May 4, 2023)

title: A Shift Towards the Future
note: And just like that, amidst all the fun and beautiful moments, life presented another turning point. A serious step towards your career, a challenge that would test your strength but also open up new doors. It was time to gear up for a different kind of journey.
displayDateInfo: Gearing up for a new challenge

title: The Tata Elxsi Interview: My Strong Girl!
note: The Tata Elxsi interview... I remember how tough that was for you. They touched upon your mother's passing, that incredibly painful week point, and it made you cry. But even through those tears, you showed immense strength, Janu. You faced it, you kept going, and you cracked that interview like the absolute champion you are! I was, and am, so incredibly proud of you, my girl. That day marked the beginning of a new professional phase, and it was time to bid farewell to one chapter and embrace another. Scroll to the next star, my love, there's a memory waiting...
displayDateInfo: Your challenging Tata Elxsi Interview (around September 30, 2023)

title: YCCE Farewell: Bittersweet Goodbyes
note: And then, the YCCE farewell. Such a mix of emotions, wasn't it? Some of your friends had jobs, some were still figuring things out. There was happiness, a touch of sadness, excitement for the future... all bundled into one memorable day. Your friend group looked amazing, a true 'wow' moment. And hey, remember that girl who asked about me, but you never introduced us? Haha, just teasing! It was the perfect send-off to your college life.

title: Corporate Calling!
note: And just like that, with college farewells done, a new horizon beckoned – the corporate world! You cracked that tough interview, my strong girl, and in November 2023, you officially became an office employee. A whole new chapter, a 'corporate majdoor' as we jokingly say, was about to begin, with its own set of challenges and triumphs.

title: Office Adventures & Boss Battles!
note: Stepping into the office was a big deal! New colleagues, a new environment... and of course, the bosses! From your 'khadus' boss Brijesh Prajapati, to working under Nitesh Tiwari, and then back to Brijesh and a new boss Smruti – what a ride! The bosses might have been hellish at times, but your office friends like Sanjana, Namrata, and Sanika? They were the loving, caring, understanding souls who made it all worthwhile. True workplace warriors, you all!

title: Our Office Buddies
note: And amidst the deadlines and meetings, you found your office buddies. Sharing lunches, little jokes, and supporting each other through the workday madness. These are the faces that make the daily grind brighter, the friends who understand the unique world of your workplace.

title: Pune Adventures Begin!
note: Then came Pune! I moved here first, and a few months later, you joined me. A new city, a new chapter for us together. And with that came new adventures, new places to explore, and so many chances to make fresh memories, just you and me.

title: Pune Cuteness Overload!
note: Our Pune days brought out a whole new level of cuteness! Remember you trying on my long black winter jacket? You looked so adorable and tiny in it – you always love wearing my clothes, don't you? And that shocked, cute face at Manish's room when we were having our deep, romantic talks... these little moments, these expressions, are just pure gold. My heart melts every time.

title: Birthday Surprise: Pawna Lake Bliss
note: For your 2024 birthday, I wanted to give you so many surprises, and our trip to Pawna Lake was one I hoped you'd cherish. We played badminton – your favorite – and I got to try my hand at archery. But the best part? Just sitting by the lake, relaxing, enjoying our own special moments together, with the beautiful water and serene surroundings. Seeing you so happy there, loving every second of it... that was my biggest gift. I hope, flying past this star, you can feel that peace and joy all over again.

title: Looking Back, Moving Forward
note: What a journey it's been, my love, flying through all these stars, these moments that make up your incredible life, and ours. From your first smile to college adventures, from quiet moments to big celebrations, each memory a precious gem. It's like watching the most beautiful story unfold, a story I'm so lucky to be a part of.

title: Threads of Destiny
note: You know, sometimes it feels like every single experience, every person we've met, every challenge we've faced, they were all just threads. Threads being woven together by destiny, creating this intricate, beautiful tapestry that is our life together. Everything leading us, step by step, to where we are now, to something even more wonderful.
displayDateInfo: The path that led us here

title: Our Shared Haven
note: And through it all, our bond has only grown deeper, stronger. We've built not just memories, but a life, a shared haven here in Pune. A place of comfort, of belonging, of knowing that no matter what, we have each other. This isn't just about looking back anymore; it's about the beautiful 'now' we've created together.

title: Now, We Are Family
note: And here we are, my dearest Akanksha. Look at us – you, me, and Ananya, all together in our Shanti home in Pune. More than just friends, more than just partners... we've become a family. This is our happy place, our little universe of love, laughter, and endless support. This is us, together, and my heart couldn't be fuller. This, my love, is everything.
displayDateInfo: Our little family in Pune (around April 16, 2025 - using CSV date for this one)

note: And so, my love, we reach the end of this journey through our stars, for now. But remember, every ending is just a new beginning. Our story continues, always unfolding, always beautiful. Thank you for being my brightest star, my Janu. I love you.
